name: Dawn Valleys
description:
Dawn Valleys is a 2D mobile runner. It was the main project of the studio I founded with some friends of mine: Chroma Cat.

I worked on this project as the main developer with 4 people (game design, art, level design, sound design), I worked on the movement gameplay, the different enemies behavior and the semi-procedural level generation.

Unfortunately, for various reasons, the team split up before the game was in a marketable state, but it remains a valuable experience that I'm very proud of, and definitely a milestone in my game making journey that taught me a lot.
